solution_line_template: Each dog gets {dog_baths_per_year} baths a year because {dog_baths_per_month} x {months_per_year} = <<{dog_baths_per_month}*{months_per_year}={dog_baths_per_year}>>{dog_baths_per_year}
Each cat gets {cat_baths_per_year} baths a year because {cat_baths_per_month} x {months_per_year} = <<{cat_baths_per_month}*{months_per_year}={cat_baths_per_year}>>{cat_baths_per_year}

Each bird averages {bird_baths_per_month_avg} baths per month because {bird_bath_frequency_numerator} / {bird_bath_frequency_denominator} = <<{bird_bath_frequency_numerator}/{bird_bath_frequency_denominator}={bird_baths_per_month_avg}>>{bird_baths_per_month_avg}
Each bird gets {bird_baths_per_year} baths a year because {bird_baths_per_month_avg} x {months_per_year} = <<{bird_baths_per_month_avg}*{months_per_year}={bird_baths_per_year}>>{bird_baths_per_year}
She gives {total_dog_baths} dog baths because {num_dogs} x {dog_baths_per_year} = <<{num_dogs}*{dog_baths_per_year}={total_dog_baths}>>{total_dog_baths}
She gives 72 cat baths because {num_cats} x {cat_baths_per_year} = {total_cat_baths}
She gives {total_bird_baths} bird baths a year because {num_birds} x {bird_baths_per_year} = <<{num_birds}*{bird_baths_per_year}={total_bird_baths}>>{total_bird_baths}
She gives 132 baths a year because {total_dog_baths} + {total_cat_baths}+ {total_bird_baths} = <<{total_dog_baths}+{total_cat_baths}+{total_bird_baths}={total_baths_per_year}>>{total_baths_per_year}
